popularProducts.name: iPad 8
popularProducts.description: The iPad 8th generation features a 10.2-inch Retina display, A12 Bionic chip, and support for Apple Pencil and Smart Keyboard.

popularProducts.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7
popularProducts.description: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 offers an 11-inch LTPS LCD display, Snapdragon 865+ processor, and S Pen support for productivity and creativity.

popularProducts.name: Microsoft Surface Pro 7
popularProducts.description: The Microsoft Surface Pro 7 features a 12.3-inch PixelSense display, Intel Core processors, and a versatile kickstand for laptop-like functionality.
